DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy intravitreal implant dexamethasone treatment diabetic macular edema .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety Efficacy New Treatment Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Key 18 year age old diabetic macular edema ; Decrease visual acuity least one eye result macular edema ( 20/50 worse ) ; Visual acuity eye worse 20/200 Key Known anticipate need ocular surgery within first 12 month study ; History glaucoma current high eye pressure require 1 medication ; Uncontrolled systemic disease ; Known steroidresponder ; Use systemic steroid Use Warfarin/Heparin
